Pre-Game Insights: Kyrie Irving scored 46 points in the Mavericks' 126-122 loss to the Portland Trail Blazers.
The Kings are 10-14 against Western Conference opponents.
The Mavericks are 14-10 in conference play.
The Kings average 13.5 made 3-pointers per game, while the Mavericks allow 14.6 per game to their opponents.
The Mavericks rank fifth in the Western Conference with 16.3 fast break points per game.
